column2: Rule Name
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "#username_hash" 4 times.
Add a private constructor to hide the implicit public one.
Add a nested comment explaining why this method is empty, throw an UnsupportedOperationException or complete the implementation.
Refactor this method to reduce its Cognitive Complexity from 18 to the 15 allowed.
Define and throw a dedicated exception instead of using a generic one.
Replace this usage of 'Stream.collect(Collectors.toList())' with 'Stream.toList()'
Method has 11 parameters, which is greater than 7 authorized.
Override equals, hashCode and toString to consider array's content in the method
Replace this use of System.out or System.err by a logger.
Rename this variable to not match a restricted identifier.
Either re-interrupt this method or rethrow the "InterruptedException" that can be caught here.
Consider using the Consumer Builder method instead of creating this nested builder.
Either remove or fill this block of code.
Remove this unused import 'java.util.UUID'.
Remove this use of "REGION_TAG_NAME"; it is deprecated.
Extract this nested code block into a method.
Merge this if statement with the enclosing one.
Replace this instanceof check and cast with 'instanceof RateLimitChallengeListener ratelimitchallengelistener'
Remove useless curly braces around statement
Add 'since' and/or 'forRemoval' arguments to the @Deprecated annotation.
Either log this exception and handle it, or rethrow it with some contextual information.
Add the missing @deprecated Javadoc tag.
Remove this unused "LOCKED_ACCOUNT_COUNTER_NAME" private field.
Replace this assert with a proper check.
Rename field "combinedUnidentifiedSenderAccessKeys"
Remove this unused "reservation" local variable.
Reorder the modifiers to comply with the Java Language Specification.
Format specifiers should be used instead of string concatenation.
Make level a static final constant or non-public and provide accessors if needed.
This block of commented-out lines of code should be removed.
Call "auth.isPresent()" or "!auth.isEmpty()" before accessing the value.
Refactor your code to get this URI from a customizable parameter.
Replace charset name argument with StandardCharsets.UTF_8
Cast one of the operands of this addition operation to a "long".
Remove this useless assignment to local variable "prohibitedUsernames".
Extract this nested try block into a separate method.
Replace this "switch" statement by "if" statements to increase readability.
Refactor this code to use the more specialised Functional Interface 'Predicate<Account>'
A "NullPointerException" could be thrown; "response" is nullable here.
Use a primitive boolean expression here.
Replace the usage of the "instanceof" operator by a catch block.
Use isEmpty() to check whether the collection is empty or not.
Remove this unnecessary cast to "CompletableFuture[]".
Provide the parametrized type for this generic.
Remove this empty statement.
Replace this lambda with method reference 'RedisCommandTimeoutException.class::isInstance'.
Change the visibility of this constructor to "protected".
Remove this usage of "parseConfiguration", it is annotated with @VisibleForTesting and should not be accessed from production code.
Invoke method(s) only conditionally.
Remove the parentheses around the "ignored" parameter
Remove the declaration of thrown exception 'org.whispersystems.textsecuregcm.controllers.RateLimitExceededException', as it cannot be thrown from method's body.
Use "java.util.Map.of()" or "java.util.Map.ofEntries()" instead.
Rename this local variable to match the regular expression '^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Use static access with "org.glassfish.jersey.model.Parameter" for "Source".
Move this call to "wait()" into a synchronized block to be sure the monitor on "Object" is held.
Remove this call to "wait" or move it into a "while" loop.
Remove this unnecessary null check; "instanceof" returns false for nulls.
Remove these useless parentheses.
Use a StringBuilder instead.
Rename "salt" which hides the field declared at line 29.
Call "remove()" on "THREAD_LOCAL_HMAC_SHA_256".
Remove this use of "Stream.peek".
Rename this field "GET_MESSAGES_FOR_DEVICE_FLUX_NAME" to match the regular expression '^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Remove the unnecessary boolean literal.
Move this method into "NotificationWorker".
Update this logger to use "ChangeNumberManager.class".
Set the credentials provider explicitly on this builder.
Set the region explicitly on this builder.
Reduce the total number of break and continue statements in this loop to use at most one.
Refactor the code in order to not assign to this loop counter from within the loop body.
Change this condition so that it does not always evaluate to "false"
Convert the abstract class "AnswerChallengeRequest" into an interface.
Catch Exception instead of Throwable.
Remove this expression which always evaluates to "true"
Save and re-use this "Random".
Use concise character class syntax '\\d' instead of '[0-9]'.
Use another way to initialize this instance.
Move the contents of this initializer to a standard constructor or to field initializers.
"cab" is the name of a field in "DynamicConverter".
Replace this if-then-else statement by a single return statement.
Use the original value instead.
Make this anonymous inner class a lambda
Use try-with-resources or close this "BufferedReader" in a "finally" clause.
